item.title: Designing a parser combinator library
item.description: .language-haskell { color: #fff!important; } .builtin { color: #fff!important; } .string { color: #fff!important; } Introduction In this article lets design and code a simple parser combinator library. The design that we’ll come up with is a simplified version of direct style parsers in streamly. Overview We can all agree the universality of folds. They are very fundamental to functional programming. Parsers are nothing but glorified folds and just as fundamental.
